name: Virgin Space (Billy Fernández)
description:
Unamuno's snake has coiled itself in the black hole of the Galactic Roman and devours everything in its path. Get into the skin of the Captain Dominica and travel to the Virgin Space in a desperate attempt to stop the catastrophe.

Textagames presents Virgin Space, an interactive fiction by Billy Y. Fernández for ereaders.

The Spanish version can be found here: https://byfernanz.itch.io/espacio-virgen

Also available at Lektu: https://lektu.com/l/textagames/virgin-space/12423

Música: Andrey Avkhimovich - Musicbox
